mapper.select: WITH RECURSIVE T AS( SELECT LAST_DAY (concat(#{year},'-',#{month},'-01') - INTERVAL 1 MONTH) + INTERVAL 1 DAY AS startDate UNION ALL SELECT startDate + INTERVAL 1 DAY FROM T WHERE startDate <LAST_DAY (concat(#{year},'-',#{month},'-01')) ) SELECT T.startDate AS emotionCreatedAt, 1 AS hasTodo FROM t_todo A LEFT JOIN t_todo_repeat B ON A.itodo = B.itodo JOIN T ON T.startDate BETWEEN A.start_date AND A.end_date AND A.iuser=#{iuser} WHERE B.itodo IS NULL

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(A.created_at,'%Y-%m-%d') AS emotionCreatedAt , A.iemotion_grade AS emotionGrade, A.iemotion_tag AS emotionTag FROM t_emotion A WHERE A.iuser=#{iuser} AND DATE_FORMAT(A.created_at,'%Y-%m')=concat(#{year},'-',#{month}) ORDER BY A.created_at

WITH RECURSIVE T AS( SELECT LAST_DAY(concat(#{year},'-',#{month},'-01')- INTERVAL 1 MONTH) + INTERVAL 1 DAY AS startDate UNION ALL SELECT startDate + INTERVAL 1 DAY FROM T WHERE startDate <LAST_DAY(concat(#{year},'-',#{month},'-01')) ) SELECT DISTINCT T.startDate AS emotionCreatedAt,1 AS hasTodo FROM T JOIN t_todo_repeat A ON case when DAYOFWEEK(T.startDate)=1 then 7 when DAYOFWEEK(T.startDate)=2 then 1 when DAYOFWEEK(T.startDate)=3 then 2 when DAYOFWEEK(T.startDate)=4 then 3 when DAYOFWEEK(T.startDate)=5 then 4 when DAYOFWEEK(T.startDate)=6 then 5 when DAYOFWEEK(T.startDate)=7 then 6 END =case when A.repeat_type='week' then A.repeat_num END OR case when A.repeat_type='month' then A.repeat_num END = DATE_FORMAT(T.startDate,'%d') JOIN t_todo B ON A.itodo=B.itodo WHERE (T.startDate>=B.start_date AND T.startDate<=B.end_date) ORDER BY T.startDate

SELECT iemotion_grade AS emotionGrade,DATE_FORMAT(created_at,'%w') AS dayOfTheWeek FROM t_emotion WHERE created_at >= '${startWeek} 00:00:00' AND created_at <='${today} 23:59:59' AND iuser=#{iuser} ORDER BY created_at ASC
